meanings.definition: A person new to or inexperienced in a field or situation.
meanings.sent1: The novices were excited to learn new skills at the workshop.
meanings.sent2: The novices asked many questions to understand the task better.
meanings.sent3: The novices accidentally mixed up the tools, creating a funny situation.
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, novices are like young seedlings just starting to grow.
meanings.sent5: The novices' eager faces showed their enthusiasm to explore the unknown territory.

meanings.sent1: Novices often seek guidance from experienced mentors.
meanings.sent2: The novices practiced diligently to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The novices' mistakes made the class burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Like novices in a dance class, they stumbled but kept trying to get the steps right.
meanings.sent5: The novices' progress was evident as they quickly grasped the basics of the game.
